pkgmetadata.longdescription: A library to process Coq and Lean snippets embedded in text documents, showing goals and messages for each input sentence. Also a literate programming toolkit. The goal of Alectryon is to make it easy to write textbooks, blog posts, and other documents that mix interactive proofs and prose. Alectryon originally supported Coq only. Support for Lean is preliminary and restricted to Lean 3.
